create_entry.refresh_message: You need to refresh the page after adding UIX for the Frontend resource to load. Click finish and then refresh the page.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance of UIX can be added.
abort.old_frontend_script_resource: Conflicting Frontend script resource {resource} is registered as a Dashboard resource. Please remove it before adding UIX.
abort.old_frontend_script_extra_module: Conflicting Frontend script resource {resource} is registered as an extra module. Please remove it before adding UIX.
